caption.title: The two-type birth–death model with types ‘sensitive’ and ‘resistant’.
caption.p:
Virus samples are grouped into the compartments by their resistance status (corresponding to a single major resistance mutation). Transmission at transmission rates λ
s and λ
r can only occur within the sensitive and resistant compartment, respectively. In either compartment, removal from the infectious pool occurs at rate δ. The compartments are connected by (exponential) rates of resistance evolution and reversion.
